transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello madam
Customer: Hanji boliye
Executive: Ha main RK agency se baat kar raha hun madam
Customer: RK agency
Executive: Ha India mart mein apna chalu hai service tahsil ka
Customer: Hanji
Executive: Tahsil nahi apna ye chale dusra kaunsa hai wo
Customer: Tahsil ke upar
Executive: Maximizer
Executive: Ha maximizer chalu hai to wo mujhe service band karwana tha
Customer: Service band karwa ke mera payment refund chahiye
Executive: Okay may I know the reason please
Customer: Jo maine jis uddesh se wo India mart liya tha utna uska benefit nahi ho raha hai to kya ho raha hai chote mote chote mote sab leads aa rahe hain bade leads jaise hi consume karte ho ek second ke andar wo dusri ko ja chali jati hai
Customer: To mujhe uska kuch fayda nahi ho raha hai benefit nahi mil raha hai to uska band karna chahiye
Executive: Hanji hanji aage
Executive: Sure aapko filter lagane sahi se aate hain kyuki ye issue beech mein bahut aaya tha but the second people started putting filters matlab
Customer: To kya hai aap kya karte ho jo bade customer hai na bade customer ko aap wo filter laga ke dete ho wo automatically unka jaise bade order aate hain unka consume ho jata hai
Executive: Actually iska concept bahut basic hai visibility on the basis of whatever plans you have gotten aapki visibility us us pe badhti hai aap wo base service pe that is maximizer I think aapne shayad 150 ded do lakh diye honge right but then there are people who have taken I am star preferred star and leader preferred leader obviously unhone acha khasa paisa lagaya to wo top pe dikhte hain basically ye cheez google mein bhi hoti hai agar aap
Customer: Wahi to wahi to ha wahi wahi ho raha hai unhone mere sath ha
Executive: So that's a basic concept you have in the whole thing ki aapko base base service aapka business ke liye nahi hota business aapko mil jata hai hand to hand but the thing is ki jo website aap bahar ek ded lakh mein banate ho wo aapko free mein mil jati hai corporate ides milti hai visibility mil jati hai
Customer: Nahi nahi wo to business ke business ke liye India mart join karte hain na customer aana chahiye customer milna chahiye
Executive: Log kuch logon ka business offline chalta hai but unko har jagah dikhna bhi hota hai obviously aur unko har jagah apna naam
Customer: Aisa nahi hai mujhe mujhe to bataya tha aisa nahi hai mujhe bataya tha ki aapko customer milenge aapko ye ho jayegi fir wo to aapka maximizer mein bhi milte hain par aap apna maximizer kya karo chote mote chote mote hai waise to mujhe fir wo char saal lagenge apna payment recover recover karne ke liye
Customer: Wo kaise hota hai
Customer: Maine jo India mart mein payment lagaya hai waise chote mote karte baitega to char saal lagenge India mart ka payment cover hone ke liye mujhe
Executive: Theek hai actually the thing is ki main ghar pe hun main office mein hun nahi but to mujhe aapka profile dekhna padega right now main lekin ye to ye to customer care number hai na aap ghar nahi
Executive: Ye to customer care number hai aap ghar pe leke kaise ja sakte ho isko
Executive: Customer care number ye third party number hota hai jitne bhi agar aap jaise aap mere client ho right to mere client ho main mere se mere se upar level and then unse upar level hamari puri ek hierarchy hai to agar aap mere form mere contact aur mujhe contact karne ki koshish kar rahe ho kyuki agar aap customer care pe bhi call karoge to wo puri team ke pass jayega
Executive: To that's how it happens ki hamari team mein se hi koi na koi aapka uthayega
Customer: To abhi abhi mujhe wo ticket open karne ke liye kisko call karna padega
Executive: Maine bata diya hai already apne manager ko he will be contacting you
Customer: Okay
Executive: Hanji maine bol diya hai ye call cut karte hi he will connect with you
Customer: Okay sir
Executive: Okay okay yes thank you
Customer: Thank you
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to discontinue Maximizer service.

- Wants a refund for the service.

- Not getting enough benefit from IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the concept of Maximizer.

- Executive informed manager to contact customer.



Next Steps: 

- Manager will contact the customer.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, maximizer, subscription, buyleads
